data.description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack. Craft tracks, and share them with friends. Race. Repeat.**


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

{2499265100265459}


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

{1695057567991201}


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

{1272215014134973}


# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

{1046525373656002}


# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

{850050203892697}


# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

changelog.change_log:
What's new in 2.60?

New features:
Co-located multiplayer 
Private rooms

Fixes:
Fixed switching to the pov camera in the editor and back breaks room mesh 
Fixed bug where the car would levitate and could not be driven 
Fixed some pieces that could not be deleted 
Fixed for application does not display an error message when losing internet connection 
Fixed The user is unable to proceed after attempting to join a full multiplayer room
Fixed - The application prompts the microphone permission two additional times when it is denied
Improved performance in Multiplayer and some tracks 
Fixed cheating using scale / move mechanic 
Fixer or user stats gets saved in the wrong format for some users 
Fixed arcade level double load on the first open 
Improved  TJ third-person camera positions 
Zero times will now not save to the high-score table 
Fixed no internet triggering after the pause 
User can not lock an editor multiplayer session with a password

🎉 Track Craft 2.40 FULL GAME RELEASE 🎉 

🏁 What’s New in the Full Version of the Game:

🗺️ 2 brand-new track packs—each with its own distinctive style
🧛🦹🧑‍🚀 New multiplayer feature—build and race together in shared space with Avatars
🚚 6 new cars
📦 Garage + 🎨 10 new skins for the cars
🛣️ 104 pre-built levels
and more...

Bugfixes
* Fixed bug that new players would not see new player tutorial

Improvements 
* All new avatars in multiplayer
* Added inverted air controls to settings
* Ghost cars now fade when close to them 
* Multiplayer room joins recommended room when all rooms empty

Improvements:

*Player options (left hand, MSAA, ground shadows) persist after reloading the game.
*More tracks are displayed in Community tracks.
*Smoother movement of cars has been implemented.
*Minor performance improvements have been made in multiplayer.
Bug Fixes:
*Replay saving should now be more reliable.
*An issue that would allow driving a car without timer to start has been fixed.
*High scores that took advantage of bugs have been cleared.

Improvements
*Multiplayer now has voice chat
*New matchmaking notification which will notify you if a multiplayer game is in progress so you can quickly join

Bugfixes
*Fixed score highlight in live ranking
*Room mesh would be used where it should  in some cases
